game.name: SOK PRO
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: SOK PRO - is a sokoban classic puzzle game, recreated on a new engine and with new functions. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. Undo of a move, colorful backgrounds, windowed mode, cute Girls and online statistics!
game.shortDescriptionEn: SOK PRO - is a sokoban classic puzzle game, recreated on a new engine and with new functions. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. Undo of a move, colorful backgrounds, windowed mode, cute Girls and online statistics!

reviewHighlights.text: At a glance this game is a set of sokoban puzzles, which alone is highly recommended if you like puzzles, as an added value, all SOK games has a simpl...
